summary: Provides lazily-initialized collections of NumPy-like data types, grouping them into categories such as numeric, floating, integer, unsigned, boolean, and complex, to be used throughout the library without requiring the target device to be known at import time.
business_intent: Enable a single source of truth for supported data types that can adapt to the runtime device, simplifying type validation, compatibility checks, and automatic selection of appropriate dtypes in computational workflows.
